name: I Was Myself in the Dream
description: You experienced the dream through your own eyes, being fully present in the scene.

name: Part of Me Was Present in the Dream
description: Only a portion or fragment of yourself was represented in the dream (e.g., you were an observer or felt disconnected).

name: I Wasnâ€™t in the Dream
description: You were not directly present; the dream played out like a movie or scene without your involvement.

name: I Was Someone Else in the Dream
description: You were an entirely different character, experiencing the dream through the eyes of someone or something else.
